Text:
just make a new DWORD value, name it : unlock_core_limit and set it to 1.
after that you are ready.

or open the notepad and put this:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VSO\ConvertXtoDVD\4.0]
"unlock_core_limit"=dword:00000001

now in save as change it to all files, name it unlock_core_limit.reg and save it. after that with one click you have ready the registry setting for 12 cores.
the keygen will have a false positive so i saved it with a rar of it incase u lose it just disable av temp for a sec and then use its safe enjoy
DAMMIT.. every time i download a program with a keygen my AVG internet security findz 2 viruses.. shit.. i fuckin hate keygens.. thnkz anywayz

just go in to your avg and allow this keygen and exclude from scanning it and u can use it fine

and or here is a list of fresh serials
